text: Uye akapinda mujere nevarume vechidiki vaviri. Mumwechete wavo akati: “Zvirokwazvo, ndaona (muhope) ndichisvina waini.” Uye umwe akati: “Zvirokwazvo, ndaona (muhope) ndakasenga chingwa nemusoro, asi shiri dzanga dzichidya kubva kwachiri.” (Vakati): “Tiudzewo zvinoreva izvi. Zvirokwazvo, tinopfunga kuti uri umwe wevanoita zvakanaka.”
